description: Lists the voice profiles in a voice profile domain.

parameters.name: VoiceProfileDomainId
parameters.description: The ID of the voice profile domain.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileId
nested_items.description: The ID of the voice profile in a voice profile summary.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the voice profile in a voice profile summary.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileDomainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the voice profile domain in a voice profile summary.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice profile summary was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice profile summary was last updated.

nested_items.name: ExpirationTimestamp
nested_items.description: Extends the life of the voice profile. You can use UpdateVoiceProfile to refresh an existing voice profile's voice print and extend the life of the summary.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token used to retrieve the next page of results.
